lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The variable money market CDs provide a low cost dependable source of funds for issuing Japanese banks," said Robert Shapiro, executive vice president with Shearson Lehman Commercial Paper Inc. "

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The rate will be reset monthly or quarterly and will be subject to a maximum of LIBOR and a minimum of the New York Fed's commercial paper composite rate.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In yesterday's series, the issuing banks' coupon rates were set at the commercial bank composite rate plus a spread which is expected to equal an all-in-cost of LIBOR minus 10 basis points, Shearson said.
